snippet: The star guard will miss Wednesday’s game against the Warriors after receiving cortisone and platelet-rich plasma injections around his ankles.
abstract: Brooklyn Nets guard Deron Williams will miss game against the Golden State Warriors after receiving cortisone and platelet-rich plasma injections around troublesome ankles.
lead_paragraph: The star guard will miss Wednesday’s game against the Warriors after receiving cortisone and platelet-rich plasma injections around his ankles.

headline.main: Bothersome Ankles Sideline Nets’ Deron Williams
